title: India Space Sector Rockets Ahead in 2025 : Powered by Government Policy and Private Partnerships , ETTelecom
description: Indian Space Sector Growth: In 2025, India's space sector experienced significant growth driven by government initiatives and public-private partnerships, focusing on satellite manufacturing, launch vehicles, and innovative startups, marking a pivotal year in space exploration and technology advancement., Indian Space Sector Growth: In 2025, India's space sector experienced significant growth driven by government initiatives and public-private partnerships, focusing on satellite manufacturing, launch vehicles, and innovative startups, marking a pivotal year in space exploration and technology advancement.

# Government push, public-private partnership drove Indian space sector growth in 2025

Further, India's private space companies advanced from demonstration to deployment in 2025. Skyroot Aerospace and Agnikul Cosmos continued to progress private orbital and semi-cryogenic launch systems, contributing to the development of a competitive domestic launch market.

- [IANS](https://telecom.economictimes.indiatimes.com/agency/87654334/IANS)

- Updated On Dec 31, 2025 at 08:58 AM IST
